translation.en: [radio DJ in Zulu] This is DJ Happygal on the morning drive.
translation.zh:
‎夸祖鲁的各位听众好
‎一位快乐的女士正向你们打招呼 ‎我是晨间随车广播的DJ快乐女孩

translation.en: KZN FM 97.2 is where you'll find us, darlings.
translation.zh: ‎夸祖鲁FM 97.2欢迎您的收听

translation.en: [in English] Your daily dose of inspiration and good vibes.
translation.zh:
‎我们将为你带来
‎一整天的活力和超棒的氛围

translation.en: [in Zulu] So, make sure that you get your dancing shoes ready.
translation.zh: ‎所以 一定要准备好你的舞鞋 ‎因为赛事蓄势待发！

translation.en: If you haven't already signed up,
translation.zh:
‎报名明天截止 ‎第五届吉瓦洛希昂舞蹈比赛的
‎参赛舞团中

translation.en: tomorrow is your last chance to enter the fifth annual Jiva Loxion Street Dance Competition.
translation.zh:
‎第五届吉瓦洛希昂舞蹈比赛的
‎参赛舞团中

translation.en: Three crews from KZN will qualify
translation.zh:
‎只有三个舞团能获得
‎进入约翰内斯堡集训营的资格

translation.en: to go to the Joburg bootcamp for nationals.
translation.zh:
‎只有三个舞团能获得
‎进入约翰内斯堡集训营的资格 ‎并参与全国赛

translation.en: So show us your Bhenga moves, your pantsula,
translation.zh: ‎所以 展示出你的传统舞步吧 ‎或带来令人耳目一新的风格

translation.en: your Amapiona, or come with a whole new style.
translation.zh: ‎或带来令人耳目一新的风格

translation.en: [in Zulu] Four times champs, Makhekhe and the Soweto Cats,
translation.zh: ‎四连冠马克赫克和索韦托猫已经落地

translation.en: have touched down for the launch at the eRoyal tonight.
translation.zh:
‎四连冠马克赫克和索韦托猫已经落地 ‎因为今晚
‎将在皇家俱乐部举行发布会

translation.en: And if you are lucky, you might get a glimpse of DJ Sika tonight.
translation.zh: ‎幸运的话 你将一睹DJ西卡的风采

translation.en: [in Zulu] Come on, boy!
translation.zh: ‎来吧 兄弟们！

translation.en: [in Zulu] Hey, guys. You know what it is, we are the Umlazi Pushers!
translation.zh: ‎各位 你们知道的 我们就是 ‎乌姆拉齐推销员！

translation.en: [in Zulu] Oh, my sister, I'm getting almost 500 likes on this video of ours.
translation.zh:
‎噢 姐姐 因为我们这条视频
‎我都收到将近500个赞了

translation.en: [in English] You're gonna be late for Matrics.
translation.zh: ‎萨姆 你的入学考试要迟到了

translation.en: Okay, did you wash my uniform?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你给我洗校服了吗？

translation.en: Did you wash your uniform?
translation.zh: ‎你自己没洗吗？

translation.en: [in Zulu] Oh, my God! Really?
translation.zh: ‎我的天！真的吗？

translation.en: -[in Zulu] Are you ready, Mom? -Yes.
translation.zh: ‎准备好了吗 妈妈？ ‎是的

translation.en: [sighs] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好了

translation.en: [in English] Did you wash your brother's uniform?
translation.zh: ‎你给你弟弟洗校服了吗？

translation.en: [in Zulu] Yes, Mom.
translation.zh: ‎是的 妈妈

translation.en: [in English] I'm so proud of him.
translation.zh: ‎我真为他骄傲

translation.en: My boy is going to be the first one in this family to go to varsity.
translation.zh:
‎我的儿子会是这个家里
‎第一个读大学的

translation.en: [in Zulu] I also could've gone to varsity.
translation.zh:
‎你知道的 妈妈
‎我本来也可以读大学

translation.en: [in English] But somebody had to work, Ntombi.
translation.zh: ‎但得有人上班挣钱 恩托比

translation.en: We all have our different paths in this life.
translation.zh: ‎难道不是人人都有不同的路要走吗？

translation.en: I'm just glad you left that nonsense of dancing behind you years ago.
translation.zh: ‎我只庆幸 你几年前终于不跳舞了

translation.en: I didn't really have a choice.
translation.zh: ‎我别无选择

translation.en: -[Ntombi's uncle] Ntombi? -[in Zulu] Yes, Uncle!
translation.zh:
‎-恩托比？
‎-在的 姆佐叔叔

translation.en: Pass me the shifting spanner.
translation.zh: ‎把活动扳手给我

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢

translation.en: -[in English] Here's your coffee. -This pressure on this tap is so low.
translation.zh:
‎-这是你的咖啡
‎-这个水龙头的压力太小了

translation.en: But you've got this, Uncle, and I've got to go.
translation.zh: ‎你可以的叔叔 我得走了

translation.en: I'm not gonna come home after work. I'm gonna see Vuyiswa.
translation.zh:
‎下班后我就不回来了
‎我要去找维依斯瓦

translation.en: Be safe.
translation.zh:
‎-注意安全
‎-好的

translation.en: [in Zulu] Get all of it.
translation.zh: ‎多来点

translation.en: I love it when you work like this.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢你这样工作

translation.en: -[in English] Want to buy my CD? 10 rand. -[in Zulu] No thanks, brother.
translation.zh:
‎-你想买我的CD吗？十兰特
‎-不了 谢谢 兄弟

translation.en: Bro, give me my change.
translation.zh: ‎兄弟 找钱啊

translation.en: You see, my brother, you're weak.
translation.zh: ‎听着 兄弟 你太怂了

translation.en: Every day this chick passes here. And you just look and say what?
translation.zh: ‎这妞儿天天路过 ‎你就看着 说话吗？什么都不说！

translation.en: [in English] You say nothing! Boy.
translation.zh: ‎你就看着 说话吗？什么都不说！

translation.en: [in Zulu] Take her out, man.
translation.zh: ‎约她出去吧 兄弟

translation.en: Eat nice things, like kebab.
translation.zh: ‎去吃点好的 烤肉串什么的

translation.en: [in English] Bill. Shut up!
translation.zh: ‎姆皮洛！闭嘴！

translation.en: [in Zulu] Okay! But keep on looking.
translation.zh: ‎好！那你继续看着吧

translation.en: You'll turn into Google, boy. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎你会变成网虫宅男的

translation.en: ♪ Ain't nobody living out, yeah… ♪ [radio DJ in Zulu] There have been reports of…
translation.zh: ‎接下来播报晨间新闻

translation.en: service delivery protest action in Umlazi.
translation.zh:
‎报告宣称乌姆拉齐
‎发生了示威游行活动

translation.en: Allegations of corruption are mounting against Mayor Gumede.
translation.zh:
‎对古梅德市长的腐败行径
‎指控越来越多 ‎（我们不是垃圾）

translation.en: [man in Zulu] Bloody Mayor. Taking money from us, feeding his pocket.
translation.zh:
‎该死的市长
‎把我们的钱装进他的口袋

translation.en: [radio DJ in English] We have a surprise this morning!
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的各位听众
‎今早有个爆炸性新闻

translation.en: [in Zulu] I'm talking about the founder of the Jiva Loxion Street Dance Competition,
translation.zh: ‎吉瓦洛希昂舞蹈比赛的创办人

translation.en: the original, the one and only DJ Sika is in the studio.
translation.zh:
‎吉瓦洛希昂舞蹈比赛的创办人 ‎独一无二的DJ西卡本人
‎就在我们的直播间

translation.en: [in English] It is going to be one of the best dance competition in Mzansi, man.
translation.zh: ‎这将是全南非最棒的舞蹈比赛

translation.en: -What inspired you? -[in Zulu] First, dance is in my blood.
translation.zh: ‎是什么启发了你呢？ ‎首先 舞蹈就是我的天性

translation.en: Dance is from the township, it's a global trendsetter.
translation.zh:
‎舞蹈是起源于小地方的
‎这是全球潮流

translation.en: [in Zulu] Sister. Sister. Please open the window, it's hot in here.
translation.zh: ‎姐妹！ ‎开个窗户吧 车里太热了

translation.en: [DJ Sika, in English] The Jiva Loxion competition is about the youth,
translation.zh: ‎吉瓦洛希昂比赛是属于年轻人的

translation.en: that's where the dancing starts.
translation.zh: ‎年轻人是舞蹈的生命

translation.en: [in Zulu] Excuse me, driver. Turn up the volume.
translation.zh:
‎不好意思 司机先生
‎请把声音调大一点

translation.en: [DJ Sika in Zulu] …in the townships. [in English] It starts with the youth dancing in their bedrooms,
translation.zh:
‎舞步起源于小地方
‎是年轻人开始跳起来的 在卧室里跳

translation.en: dancing in the streets, dancing at house parties,
translation.zh:
‎在街上跳舞 在家庭派对上跳舞
‎甚至在计程车候客站上跳舞

translation.en: dancing at local taxi ranks,
translation.zh:
‎在街上跳舞 在家庭派对上跳舞
‎甚至在计程车候客站上跳舞 ‎却没有人给他们表现的机会
‎你能理解我的心情吗？

translation.en: and no one ever gives them the opportunity to shine. Do you feel me?
translation.zh:
‎却没有人给他们表现的机会
‎你能理解我的心情吗？

translation.en: [in Zulu] I hear you. I feel you. Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-深刻地理解啊
‎-是啊

translation.en: [DJ Sika in English] The prizes are unreal this year.
translation.zh: ‎而且今年的奖品也很让人不敢相信

translation.en: Brand sponsorship for your crew for a year.
translation.zh: ‎你的舞团将获得赞助商一年的资助

translation.en: A million rand check.
translation.zh: ‎一张一百万兰特的支票

translation.en: And the title of the best street dance crew in South Africa.
translation.zh: ‎还有南非最佳舞团的头衔

translation.en: [in Zulu] R1 000 000 is no joke. So do what you must…
translation.zh:
‎一百万兰特不是开玩笑的 ‎所以拼尽全力为获胜而战吧
‎小伙子们

translation.en: [in English] And fight for the crown, gents. And of course, ladies.
translation.zh:
‎所以拼尽全力为获胜而战吧
‎小伙子们 ‎当然了 还有姑娘们

translation.en: Hey, buddy. Feeling trapped?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你们好 感觉被困住了吗？

translation.en: Story of my life.
translation.zh: ‎是我生活的写实啊

translation.en: -Debrah, thank you. -Hmm.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢

translation.en: [in Zulu] Tell me, do you hate me?
translation.zh: ‎告诉我 ‎你讨厌我吗？

translation.en: No!
[in English] Why're you always late, though?
translation.zh: ‎那你为什么总迟到呢？

translation.en: Wait, Debrah, this is impossible.
translation.zh: ‎等等 黛波拉 这不可能

translation.en: Timesheet never lies.
translation.zh: ‎出勤卡可不会说谎

translation.en: You know I'm taking care of my entire family.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 我得照顾全家人

translation.en: Who isn't?
translation.zh: ‎谁不是呢？

translation.en: [in Zulu] Listen, everyone is up to here with black tax.
translation.zh: ‎听着 来这儿工作的人都不容易

translation.en: [in English] All you need to do is to suck it up, and smile
translation.zh: ‎所以你需做的就是忍耐 露出微笑

translation.en: 'cause we have a school tour coming up now.
translation.zh:
‎因为学校游览团马上就要来了
‎我们得招待好

translation.en: We need to entertain them. Be happy, be happy, be happy, okay.
translation.zh:
‎因为学校游览团马上就要来了
‎我们得招待好 ‎端出开心的样子 好吗？

translation.en: -Be happy happy. -[plastic dolphin squeals]
translation.zh: ‎要开心…

translation.en: Smile. More like it. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎笑一笑 好多了 好了

translation.en: [Paul] Your show is not doing well. -Fuck! -You need more drama,
translation.zh:
‎-你的真人秀不太行 得更有戏剧性啊
‎-该死

translation.en: [in Zulu] or else you'll be canceled, finished and that's that.
translation.zh: ‎不然你的真人秀会被砍掉 就完了

translation.en: -[in English] Don't you have skeletons? -No.
translation.zh: ‎你就没点儿什么不为人知的料吗？

translation.en: -Drug abuse? -Really, P?
translation.zh:
‎-不 没有！
‎-吸毒？ ‎认真的吗？

translation.en: Criminal activity, crazy ex-girlfriend? Come on, give me something juicy!
translation.zh:
‎犯罪行为 疯狂的前女友？
‎来吧 给我来点劲爆的！

translation.en: Yo! There's this girl I used to date back in high school.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿！
‎-什么？ ‎有个姑娘 我们高中时约会过

translation.en: Ahh! Tell me more.
translation.zh: ‎啊哈！快接着讲

translation.en: Hot, nice things.
translation.zh: ‎身材非常火辣

translation.en: That is it! Let's get her on the show.
translation.zh: ‎就要这种！我们拍她上真人秀

translation.en: Hell no, P. I haven't talked to this girl in seven years.
translation.zh: ‎不行的 我都七年没跟她联系过了

translation.en: That's even better. We'll be there, we'll catch the fire with… Ruin in. Ya-ya-ya…
translation.zh:
‎那更好 我们会在现场
‎拍摄到你们之间的火花…

translation.en: This girl could be married for all I know, or living in another country, bro.
translation.zh:
‎据我所知 她可能都嫁人了
‎或者搬到异国他乡了 兄弟

translation.en: You're not the only person with a reality TV show.
translation.zh: ‎拍真人秀的可不止你一个

translation.en: You're not the only person. There's Khanyi Mbau, Somizi, Bonang.
translation.zh:
‎拍真人秀的可不止你一个 ‎还有卡伊姆巴乌 索米兹 波南
‎让我告诉你吧

translation.en: Let me tell you.
translation.zh:
‎还有卡伊姆巴乌 索米兹 波南
‎让我告诉你吧

translation.en: They're killing you, dawg! You're here, they're here.
translation.zh:
‎你差太远了 兄弟！
‎你在这里 他们在这里

translation.en: [in Zulu] Come on, king!
translation.zh: ‎你可以的！来吧 兄弟！

translation.en: Come on, king. G-O-T! Greatest. Come here, man!
translation.zh: ‎来吧 兄弟 他是最牛的…

translation.en: Yes, king! Yes!
translation.zh: ‎太好了 兄弟！太好了！

translation.en: -[chanting in English] Season four, four! -Season four, season four, four, four!
translation.zh: ‎太好了 兄弟！太好了！ ‎第四季！第四季！

translation.en: That's right!
translation.zh: ‎这就对啦 老大！

translation.en: Baby.
translation.zh: ‎宝贝

translation.en: [in Zulu] Not today, friend.
translation.zh: ‎今天没心情 姐妹

translation.en: -And now? -[in English] Nathi… is in town.
translation.zh: ‎现在呢？ ‎纳提回来了

translation.en: -What? -As for what he wants, only God knows.
translation.zh: ‎什么？ ‎至于他想要什么 只有老天知道

translation.en: What, is he entering the competition again?
translation.zh: ‎他又要参赛吗？

translation.en: He's won it so many times. We get it. Oh, my gosh! Makhekhe, you're so amazing.
translation.zh:
‎他赢过那多次了 我们知道你牛
‎我的天呐！马克赫克 你好厉害哦

translation.en: He doesn't need the cash, he doesn't need the fame.
translation.zh: ‎他不需要钱 也不需要名气

translation.en: [in Zulu] Oh, have a break, girl, breathe. Rest. Oh!
translation.zh: ‎哦 缓一缓 姐妹 深呼吸 缓缓

translation.en: [in Zulu] Do you think he's going to be at eRoyal tonight?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得他今晚会去皇家俱乐部吗？

translation.en: [in English] Probably. I mean, it's the big weekend.
translation.zh: ‎可能吧 毕竟…周末是场盛会

translation.en: It's the launch, everyone will be there. All your favorites, DJ Sika, the judges.
translation.zh: ‎发布会嘛 大家都会去的 ‎你爱的DJ西卡和评委们都在

translation.en: [in Zulu] What really matters, now, is your time.
translation.zh: ‎现在最重要的是…这次是你的机遇

translation.en: [in English] For what?
translation.zh: ‎什么机遇？

translation.en: I'm not entering. So.
translation.zh: ‎我不会参加的 所以…

translation.en: Okay, maybe you can keep it at that.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你要这样也行

translation.en: As far as Nathi's concerned, you're probably going to see him tonight.
translation.zh:
‎但是 说回纳提
‎你今晚很可能会见到他

translation.en: What are you gonna say?
translation.zh: ‎所以 你要怎么说？

translation.en: [in Zulu] I guess I'll be just honest, and say: listen Nathi, when you--
translation.zh:
‎我应该会实话实说吧 比方说
‎听我说 纳提 当你…

translation.en: [in English] When you disappeared on me, that really broke my heart.
translation.zh: ‎当你离开我时 我非常伤心

translation.en: You're not gonna say that. [in Zulu] You cannot spell imenemene without "men."
translation.zh:
‎你不能这么说啊
‎提到他就不能不提骗子啊

translation.en: [in English] And we don't show men that they hurt us. Right?
translation.zh: ‎不让男人看到我们因他们受伤 好吧

translation.en: So you're gonna have to give me something else.
translation.zh: ‎所以…你得再想想怎么说

translation.en: Hmm…
Actually, Nathi… Mm?
translation.zh:
‎-说真的 纳提…
‎-嗯哼

translation.en: You… are an asshole.
translation.zh: ‎你…就是个混蛋

translation.en: -There we go. -[in Zulu] Asshole and… Nathi… mean the same thing.
translation.zh:
‎-说得好
‎-混蛋跟纳提 简直是同一个词

translation.en: [in English] Same WhatsApp group. -[in Zulu] Listen… -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-聊天都得分在同一组
‎-听着…

translation.en: -…don't forget I know you. -Okay!
translation.zh: ‎别忘了我知道你的真面目

translation.en: [in English] Oh, I know you.
translation.zh: ‎哦 我了解你的

translation.en: So I can see right through that fake celebrity persona of yours.
translation.zh:
‎所以我能透过你所谓的名人面具
‎看到你渣男的本质

translation.en: All right, catfish! Yes! [in Zulu] Let's not forget that all this dancing of yours,
translation.zh:
‎-说得好！
‎-而且我们别忘了

translation.en: you learned it from me.
translation.zh: ‎你所有的舞技 都是我教的

translation.en: -Hit him where it hurts! Hmm! -Hmm!
translation.zh:
‎-天啊！要直击他的痛处！
‎-嗯…必须的

translation.en: This calls for a new dress, my friend!
translation.zh: ‎你得来件新的战袍

translation.en: [in English] A toast to you!
translation.zh: ‎这杯敬你！

translation.en: Ooh! Okay.
translation.zh: ‎噢！不错

translation.en: Boys, I'm going to walk and talk to this girl.
translation.zh: ‎兄弟们 我现在要过去跟她搭话了

translation.en: [in Zulu] You lost your mind?
translation.zh:
‎-你疯了吗？
‎-如果恩达巴先生看到你

translation.en: If Mr. Ndaba was to see you chatting up that girl,
translation.zh:
‎-你疯了吗？
‎-如果恩达巴先生看到你 ‎跟那个女孩聊天
‎我告诉你 他饶不了你的

translation.en: I'm telling you, he'll kill you.
translation.zh:
‎跟那个女孩聊天
‎我告诉你 他饶不了你的

translation.en: Plus, you don't stand a chance with her.
translation.zh: ‎再说了 你也泡不到她的

translation.en: You don't have the slightest chance, man.
translation.zh: ‎一点机会都没有的

translation.en: Not a chance. Never!
translation.zh: ‎没戏的 永远没戏！

translation.en: Guys, guys!
translation.zh: ‎兄弟们 兄弟们！

translation.en: Watch and learn. We'll see about this.
translation.zh:
‎-学着点 兄弟们
‎-我们会的

translation.en: Only the brave shall conquer.
translation.zh: ‎"只有勇敢的人才能赢" ‎得在他们面前争口气

translation.en: Uh…
-Hey, ladies. -Hello.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 女士们
‎-你好

translation.en: So, um, are you guys entering the Jiva Loxion Competition?
translation.zh:
‎所以 呃…
‎你们要参加吉瓦洛希昂比赛吗？

translation.en: [in Zulu] No, I thought about it, but I don't have a group, so…
translation.zh: ‎不 我是想参加的 但没有舞团 所以…

translation.en: -And you? -Yes, obviously.
translation.zh:
‎-你呢？
‎-要的 当然了

translation.en: As you can see the Umlazi Pushers are all together.
translation.zh: ‎如你所见 乌姆拉齐推销员都在呢

translation.en: You have a whole crew! Where did you learn dancing?
translation.zh:
‎你们有那么多人！
‎你从哪里学的舞呀？ ‎呃？

translation.en: -What? -Impossible.
translation.zh:
‎-永远没戏！
‎-不可能的

translation.en: -You underestimate me. -I've never seen you dance.
translation.zh:
‎-你显然是低估了我
‎-我从没见过你跳舞

translation.en: [in English] Let's do like this.
translation.zh:
‎好 现在这样如何？
‎要是我能向你证明我会跳舞

translation.en: If I can prove to you that I can dance, will you…
translation.zh:
‎好 现在这样如何？
‎要是我能向你证明我会跳舞 ‎你能…给我你的电话吗？

translation.en: give me your number?
translation.zh: ‎你能…给我你的电话吗？

translation.en: [in Zulu] I'll think about it.
translation.zh: ‎我考虑考虑

translation.en: Show me what you've got. [in English] All right.
translation.zh:
‎-但先让我见识见识吧
‎-好啊

translation.en: [in Zulu] Now that you've seen my moves, are you going to give me your number?
translation.zh: ‎那么…既然你已经看过我跳舞了 ‎你要给我电话吗？

translation.en: Well, you can dance. Maybe I'll see you at the competition.
translation.zh: ‎既然你跳得还行 没准我们能比赛见

translation.en: Who's this now?
translation.zh: ‎这是谁啊？

translation.en: [Nathi in English] Back in my hood.
translation.zh:
‎看看 这是我的地盘 我的家乡
‎我们过去常在这里玩

translation.en: You know, back home. This is where we used to hang around, dance.
translation.zh:
‎看看 这是我的地盘 我的家乡
‎我们过去常在这里玩 ‎一起跳舞 重回高中时代
‎兄弟们 疯狂岁月啊

translation.en: Get lit back in our high school days, man. Crazy, crazy, crazy times.
translation.zh:
‎一起跳舞 重回高中时代
‎兄弟们 疯狂岁月啊

translation.en: This is where all the cool kids used to hang around.
translation.zh: ‎这是酷孩子们玩的地方

translation.en: All these youngsters that you see, they're following my footsteps.
translation.zh: ‎现在你们看到的这些年轻人 ‎都跟随着我的脚步

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎是啊

translation.en: Aah, the Romany Cream!
translation.zh: ‎啊 是巧克力甜心呀！

translation.en: -Hey, Samu! You've grown. -Aah!
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 萨姆！你长大了
‎-啊！

translation.en: You know, I'm a man now.
translation.zh:
‎-我已经是男人了
‎-是啊！

translation.en: [in Zulu] Your bike looks great.
translation.zh: ‎你的车酷毙了 嘿

translation.en: -[in English] The swag, dripping leakage. -Of course.
translation.zh:
‎-太酷了
‎-当然

translation.en: Look, we're also working on our own designs. I'm designing it, the label.
translation.zh: ‎看 我们也自己设计舞团服装 ‎标签是我设计的 100%乌姆拉齐

translation.en: 100% Umlazi.
translation.zh: ‎标签是我设计的 100%乌姆拉齐

translation.en: You must hook me up when done.
translation.zh: ‎说完告诉我一声 孩子们

translation.en: [in Zulu] And your pants? How much are they?
translation.zh: ‎你的裤子呢？得多少钱啊？

translation.en: [in English] Let me give you boys a quick summary.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我直接告诉你们吧

translation.en: [in Zulu] Look, guys. Made in France for 15 grand.
translation.zh:
‎-听着各位 法国制造一万五
‎-什么！

translation.en: The shoes, 20k.
translation.zh:
‎-听着各位 法国制造一万五
‎-什么！ ‎-鞋子两万
‎-两万！

translation.en: [in English] Twenty thousand?
translation.zh:
‎-鞋子两万
‎-两万！

translation.en: But this, this is a scarf. It's a brand ambassador's gift.
translation.zh: ‎这条围巾是品牌大使的礼物

translation.en: -Put us on! How do you do it? -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-告诉我们 你是怎么做到的？
‎-好的

translation.en: [in Zulu] Guys, I didn't go to varsity and waste government resources
translation.zh:
‎好吧 伙计们 我没上大学
‎也没浪费政府资源

translation.en: and waste my parents' money to get an education.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 伙计们 我没上大学
‎也没浪费政府资源 ‎没浪费父母的钱去受教育

translation.en: [in English] I went to the university of life.
translation.zh: ‎而是去读了生活的大学

translation.en: -I'm a proud graduate of the streets. -That's all?
translation.zh: ‎很自豪毕业于街头 仅此而已

translation.en: [in Zulu] Don't get me wrong, guys. [in English] I'm not saying, don't go to school.
translation.zh:
‎但别误会我 伙计们
‎我不是说“别去上学”

translation.en: [in Zulu] Go to school, and get the education, guys.
translation.zh:
‎还是要上学 要接受教育的 伙计们
‎我只是说上学并不是

translation.en: [in English] All I'm saying is education is not the only key to success.
translation.zh:
‎还是要上学 要接受教育的 伙计们
‎我只是说上学并不是 ‎成功唯一的出路 我希望你们都成为…

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: ‎成功唯一的出路 我希望你们都成为…

translation.en: I want you all to be good role models to the next generation of Skhothane.
translation.zh:
‎成功唯一的出路 我希望你们都成为… ‎-下一届舞蹈比赛的好榜样
‎-好的！

translation.en: -Yes! -[in Zulu] Do not abuse women.
translation.zh:
‎-下一届舞蹈比赛的好榜样
‎-好的！ ‎别虐待女性 别滥用毒品 好吧？

translation.en: [in English] Do not do drugs, yes? [in Zulu] Umlazi Pushers, all about love!
translation.zh: ‎别虐待女性 别滥用毒品 好吧？ ‎乌姆拉齐推销员 源于热爱！

translation.en: -Love! Skhothanes! -Thank you!
translation.zh:
‎-热爱！舞蹈比赛！
‎-谢谢！

translation.en: Makhekhe, the man!
translation.zh: ‎他是马克赫克！

translation.en: [in English] Your sister, how's she doing?
translation.zh: ‎你姐姐 她怎么样了？

translation.en: Ah, you know, same old, same old. Still uncool.
translation.zh: ‎啊 你知道的 还是老样子 不酷

translation.en: [chuckles] Come on. Can I pass by your house, just to say hi?
translation.zh: ‎好了 我能去你家吗？就打声招呼

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎当然

translation.en: -Can I have her number? -Sure, sure, sure, sure.
translation.zh:
‎-能给我她的电话吗？
‎-当然可以

translation.en: -Samu. -[in Zulu] Hey, Makhekhe, the man.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 这就是马克赫克！

translation.en: -Debrah! -[huffs]
translation.zh:
‎-黛波拉！
‎-哈！

translation.en: Okay, team abort the mission, the eagle has landed. I found Ntombi. Over and out.
translation.zh:
‎好了 团队取消任务 鹰已着陆
‎我找到恩托比了 通话完毕

translation.en: Debrah, I'm so sorry. I had to go get medication for Mom at the pharmacy.
translation.zh:
‎黛波拉 很抱歉
‎我得去药房给我妈妈…取药

translation.en: That doesn't look like medication to me.
translation.zh: ‎我看那不是药

translation.en: Honestly!
translation.zh: ‎说真的

translation.en: -What's this? -First written warning.
translation.zh:
‎-这是什么？
‎-第一次书面警告

translation.en: Lunch ended 20 minutes ago, Ntombi. 20 minutes ago!
translation.zh:
‎午餐20分钟前结束了 恩托比
‎20分钟前！

translation.en: At the close, you have toilet duties.
translation.zh: ‎今天结束后 厕所你负责收拾

translation.en: -Debrah, toilets! -Or you want something else?
translation.zh:
‎-黛波拉 厕所吗！
‎-你想负责别的？

translation.en: -No. -Thought so.
translation.zh:
‎-不
‎-我想也是

translation.en: Toilets.
translation.zh: ‎收拾厕所！

translation.en: [Ntombi] Hey, Vu. I'm on my way. I had the worst day.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 小维 我在路上了
‎今天真是最糟糕的一天了

translation.en: Look, I really don't want to go out tonight.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我今晚真的不想出去了

translation.en: Nathi.
translation.zh: ‎啊！你看呀！

translation.en: [in Zulu] Energy, girl. Wake up, baby.
translation.zh: ‎有点精神 姑娘 打起精神来呀 宝贝

translation.en: [in English] Pick your fighter, babe. We've got Lisa, Thandiswa, and Sister Bettina!
translation.zh:
‎选择漂亮的假发吧 宝贝 这里有莉莎
‎坦迪斯瓦和好姐妹贝尔蒂娜！

translation.en: [Ntombi] I told you I'm not going out.
translation.zh: ‎噢！我跟你说了 我不想出去

translation.en: Hey, hey, the liver! -Ah-ah, ah-ah. -Girl!
translation.zh: ‎嘿…宝贝

translation.en: Look, you are beautiful,
translation.zh: ‎听着 你又美丽

translation.en: you are young, you are Black.
translation.zh: ‎又年轻 是黑美人

translation.en: And the world needs to see it. You're going to walk into a club
translation.zh: ‎要让世界看到你的 ‎你要昂首挺胸地走进俱乐部

translation.en: with your gorgeous head held high.
translation.zh: ‎你要昂首挺胸地走进俱乐部

translation.en: And you're going to show Makhekhe
translation.zh: ‎让马克赫克看看

translation.en: that he didn't break you.
translation.zh: ‎他没有伤到你半分

translation.en: Mm, girl.
translation.zh: ‎嗯…姐妹 嗯…

translation.en: Mm, I guess she is nice.
translation.zh: ‎嗯…我觉得这件很美

translation.en: -Pick that! Yeah! -Who is she?
translation.zh:
‎-就是她了！对！
‎-她是谁呀？

translation.en: [in Zulu] Yes! What's your problem?
translation.zh:
‎-好诶！
‎-你有什么毛病？

translation.en: Your shirts look like tea packets. Think we're here to drink tea?
translation.zh:
‎你们的衬衫看起来跟茶包似的
‎你以为来这儿是要喝茶吗？

translation.en: What's with your pineapple shirts? Is this heaven?
translation.zh:
‎你们的菠萝衬衫是怎么回事？
‎这里是天堂吗？

translation.en: -Is this a farm? -Guys, show us what you've got?
translation.zh:
‎这是农场吗？
‎展示你们的实力给我们看看啊？

translation.en: [in English] Wow! I definitely needed this.
translation.zh:
‎-哇！
‎-我绝对需要这个

translation.en: [in Zulu] Hey, hey, guys!
translation.zh: ‎嘿 各位！

translation.en: [in English] I am the one and only DJ Happygal!
translation.zh: ‎我是独一无二的DJ快乐女孩！

translation.en: And you're about to get happy tonight!
translation.zh: ‎今晚你们马上就要开心起来！ ‎(第五届吉瓦洛希昂舞蹈年度比赛)

translation.en: That is my song! [laughing]
translation.zh: ‎这是我爱的歌！

translation.en: My two favorite girls!
translation.zh: ‎噢 我最爱的两个女孩！

translation.en: You look gorgeous, man.
translation.zh: ‎你们太美了

translation.en: -[in Zulu] Thank you, Ma. -[in English] How's bra Joe?
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 ‎姆佐大哥怎么样？

translation.en: He's good. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎他很好

translation.en: Say hi to him for me. I will, definitely.
translation.zh:
‎-你得替我向他问好
‎-噢！一定的

translation.en: [in Zulu] Bye, Ma, see you later.
translation.zh: ‎拜拜 晚些见

translation.en: [Menzi in Zulu] Oh, yes! Vuvu, you're hot, girl.
translation.zh: ‎噢天呐！小维你真性感

translation.en: [in English] Oh, my God!
translation.zh: ‎我的天呐！

translation.en: What? You're still mad at me?
translation.zh: ‎怎么？还生我的气吗？

translation.en: [in Zulu] Why don't you give him a chance? [in English] Who? Menzi? Come on. He doesn't have the Range,
translation.zh:
‎-姐妹 你为什么不给他个机会？
‎-谁？门兹吗？他没机会

translation.en: or the Rover.
translation.zh: ‎也没路虎

translation.en: We'll have what they're having.
translation.zh: ‎他们有什么 我们也会有什么

translation.en: [in Zulu] You know?
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？姐妹

translation.en: [in English] There's no man more single than a married one.
translation.zh: ‎没什么比已婚男更好钓了

translation.en: [in Zulu] Indeed, friend. Thirst!
translation.zh: ‎真的 姐妹 饥渴难耐啊！

translation.en: [in English] Why does Zinhle do this here? She's too good for it.
translation.zh:
‎-辛赫可以来这套 嘿
‎-她太可以了

translation.en: Maybe when we were 16, 17,
translation.zh: ‎大概我们16、17岁时可以

translation.en: [in Zulu] but now, forget it.
translation.zh: ‎但现在？算了吧

translation.en: [man 2 in English] What do we have here? You want a drink?
translation.zh: ‎这里有什么？想喝一杯吗？

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: ‎当然

translation.en: [Ntombi] I'm going to the ladies.
translation.zh: ‎我要去洗手间了

translation.en: [in Zulu] Wait a sec.
translation.zh: ‎啊！等一下

translation.en: [in English] How about you go back to your table,
translation.zh: ‎不如 你回你那桌去

translation.en: and then I'll get myself a drink.
translation.zh: ‎我给自己来一杯

translation.en: [barman in Zulu] What are you having?
translation.zh: ‎好的 你想来杯什么？

translation.en: [in English] Water, tap water, okay?
translation.zh: ‎水 自来水就好

translation.en: I missed you.
translation.zh: ‎我很想你

translation.en: I think this is where you tell me you missed me.
translation.zh: ‎现在是不是该你说 你也想我了

translation.en: Oh, come on! Really? After seven years. This is you?
translation.zh: ‎啊 拜托！真的？过了七年了 就这？

translation.en: Just magically making your way back into my friend's life, trying to finesse her.
translation.zh:
‎想说些花言巧语
‎骗我朋友回到你身边吗？

translation.en: Ha! It's the audacity for me.
translation.zh: ‎哈！胆子够肥啊

translation.en: V, V, V, you're still feisty as ever.
translation.zh: ‎小维 一如既往牙尖嘴利

translation.en: Look, you can try the superstar act elsewhere.
translation.zh:
‎得啦！听着
‎你可以到别处施展你的明星魅力

translation.en: But this woman here, is done with you.
translation.zh: ‎但这女士已经跟你没关系了

translation.en: All right. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好的 好吧

translation.en: Go and have some self-respect. My gosh! Bye!
translation.zh: ‎有点自尊行吗？天呐！再见

translation.en: [in Zulu] You suck!
translation.zh: ‎你个烂人！

translation.en: You have no shame.
translation.zh: ‎无耻之辈

translation.en: [in English] Don't make that face. What was that about?
translation.zh: ‎别那副表情 怎么回事？

translation.en: Babe, I had it under control.
translation.zh: ‎宝贝…我控制住了

translation.en: Okay. Have a sip.
translation.zh: ‎好了 来一口

translation.en: You're going to put a beautiful smile on that face.
translation.zh: ‎来 笑一笑

translation.en: Chest out, butt out.
translation.zh: ‎挺胸 翘臀

translation.en: -We're going to slay, okay? -That's definitely what we're gonna do.
translation.zh:
‎-我们要迷翻全场 好吗？
‎-好 ‎我们一定会的

translation.en: You had one job.
translation.zh: ‎就拜托你做一件事

translation.en: [in Zulu] You think I joke.
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我在开玩笑吧

translation.en: You exaggerate sometimes in all your stories.
translation.zh: ‎有时候你讲自己的事就是会夸张

translation.en: They called me on stage, and said I must perform a solo.
translation.zh: ‎嘿！他们让我上舞台独舞一段

translation.en: -[laughing] -Zila.
translation.zh: ‎我就这样跳

translation.en: [in English] These kids… if they want to know how to dance, they must come and ask me.
translation.zh: ‎这些孩子…想学跳舞一定得来问我

translation.en: [Madlamini in Zulu] You're something else.
translation.zh: ‎你真厉害

translation.en: [Uncle Zo] Let's go to Pinky's.
translation.zh: ‎咱们一起去吧

translation.en: [Madlamini in English] Every weekend we set up a dance.
translation.zh: ‎每周末我们都会举办舞蹈训练

translation.en: Right here in the garden. I prefer it that way,
translation.zh: ‎在花园里 我更喜欢这样

translation.en: than rolling myself to some pub with a wheelchair. And have everyone stare at me.
translation.zh:
‎而不是摇着轮椅去酒吧
‎大家都盯着看我

translation.en: You know what, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？对不起

translation.en: I just pushed it a little bit too far, you know.
translation.zh: ‎也许我有点言过其实了 对吧？

translation.en: But again… I would have loved to, but hey.
translation.zh: ‎但是…我是想去的 但是 嘿…

translation.en: It wouldn't be the same without you.
translation.zh: ‎没有你就不一样了

translation.en: [in Zulu] Hey, my baby. Hello, Nolwazi.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我的宝贝 你好 诺瓦兹

translation.en: -Hello. -[clears throat, chuckles nervously]
translation.zh: ‎你好

translation.en: [in Zulu] Hey, hey, Nolwazi. It's me, Samu.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 诺瓦兹 是我 萨姆基勒

translation.en: [in English] Oh, hi Samu. What's up?
translation.zh: ‎哦 嗨 萨姆基勒 怎么了？

translation.en: Ah, you know me…
translation.zh: ‎啊 你知道的 我…

translation.en: just chilling. Um, actually I had my math textbook out
translation.zh: ‎冷静点 呃…其实我已经拿出数学书

translation.en: and a calculator, you know. Matric can be pretty hard. [chuckling]
translation.zh:
‎和…计算器了 你知道的
‎考试会…很难的 所以…

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: ‎是的 没错

translation.en: Yeah, sure. Um… I was thinking maybe
translation.zh: ‎是的 嗯…我在想…也许…

translation.en: we can meet up tomorrow, and you come and study at my house with me.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以明天见
‎你到我家来 我们一起学习

translation.en: Okay, maybe.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 也许吧…

translation.en: [in Zulu] Look, I'm in a bit of a rush.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我现在有点急着去

translation.en: [in English] I'm going to club eRoyal for the Jiva Loxion launch party.
translation.zh:
‎在皇家俱乐部举办的
‎吉瓦洛希昂比赛的发布会派对 所以…

translation.en: [gasps] Say what?
translation.zh: ‎你说什么？

translation.en: I-- I can meet you there. Yeah, no. We can-- we can meet up.
translation.zh:
‎我可以去那里见你
‎是的 我们可以碰面

translation.en: Um, I thought you were busy with school stuff though.
translation.zh: ‎呃 我还以为你忙着考试什么的

translation.en: Oh, school can wait. School can wait. I mean, it's a Friday night.
translation.zh: ‎那不着急 现在可是周五晚上

translation.en: Of course, I can come through and come chill with you.
translation.zh: ‎我当然可以过去跟你一起 然后…

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah! Maybe we can dance like we danced at the beach earlier.
translation.zh:
‎我当然可以过去跟你一起 然后… ‎也许我们可以一起跳舞
‎像早些时候在海边那样

translation.en: Okay, cool. I guess I'll see you soon.
translation.zh: ‎那挺好 待会见啦

translation.en: [chuckles] See you soon.
translation.zh: ‎待会见

translation.en: Yes, boy! [chuckles] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎太好了！好了

translation.en: [in Zulu] Combination is communicating.
translation.zh: ‎这套可以

translation.en: -Oh! -I don't think so.
Oh, okay, do you want to see my ID? It's fine, it's fine. Just-- just say it.
translation.zh:
‎哦 好吧
‎是要看我的身份证吗？没问题的 ‎你直说就好了

translation.en: Ah! I think I left it at home. My own home.
translation.zh: ‎啊！我好像落在家里了 我自己家

translation.en: The one that I own, because I am 30.
translation.zh: ‎我有自己的家 因为我已经30岁了

translation.en: I know your father.
translation.zh: ‎我认识你父亲

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: ‎什么？

translation.en: Out!
translation.zh: ‎出去！

translation.en: -[in Zulu] Okay fine. Don't touch me. -Go ahead, sir.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 别碰我

translation.en: [in English] Oh, yes!
translation.zh: ‎太好了！哈哈！

translation.en: Samu!
translation.zh: ‎萨姆！

translation.en: -[in Zulu] Hey, Uncle. -Where are you going, boy?
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 叔叔
‎-你要去哪儿啊 小子？

translation.en: I'm going to the Jiva Loxion launch party.
translation.zh: ‎我要去吉瓦洛希昂比赛的发布会派对

translation.en: At this hour?
translation.zh: ‎这个点儿去吗？

translation.en: Uncle, you know such parties happen at night.
translation.zh:
‎叔叔 你知道的
‎这些派对都是晚上开的

translation.en: Samukelo, you're doing matric, my boy.
translation.zh: ‎萨姆基勒 你要准备考试了 孩子

translation.en: [in English] This is the most important year of your life. I think you must study.
translation.zh:
‎这是你人生中最重要的一年
‎我觉得你应该学习

translation.en: [in Zulu] No, Uncle.
translation.zh: ‎不 叔叔

translation.en: Relax about studying. You see… [in English] Education…
translation.zh: ‎别把学习看得那么重 ‎你知道的 学习不是成功唯一的出路

translation.en: is not the only key to success.
translation.zh: ‎你知道的 学习不是成功唯一的出路

translation.en: [in Zulu] Samu, listen to me.
translation.zh: ‎好了 萨姆基勒 你给我听好

translation.en: You see… [in English] As long as you live under this roof, [in Zulu] you'll live by my rules.
translation.zh: ‎只要你住在这个屋檐下…就要听我的

translation.en: [in English] You're going to sit down, and study. Yes?
translation.zh: ‎你要坐下来学习 明白吗？

translation.en: This is not even your house.
translation.zh: ‎这又不是你的房子

translation.en: [in Zulu] Excuse me?
translation.zh: ‎你说什么？

translation.en: [in English] I thought as much.
translation.zh: ‎果不其然

translation.en: Study! Samu.
translation.zh: ‎学习 萨姆

translation.en: [in Zulu] Boy, today's the day. Are you making a move?
translation.zh: ‎兄弟 就是今天了 你要行动吗？

translation.en: No, Mpilo, you know I just came to give DJ Sika my CD, and not here for girls.
translation.zh:
‎不 姆皮洛 你知道的 我来是为了…
‎把我的CD给DJ西卡 不是为了泡妞的

translation.en: Boy, there he is. Go and give him your CD, superstar.
translation.zh:
‎他就在那里 兄弟 快去把你的CD给他
‎明日之星 你还在等什么？

translation.en: [in English] Maybe today isn't a good time to give him the CD.
translation.zh: ‎也许今天不是给他CD的好时机

translation.en: Sika's always talking about you.
translation.zh: ‎西卡总谈起你

translation.en: Every single night when I was a little boy, I'd sneak into this club.
translation.zh:
‎我小时候
‎每晚都偷偷溜进这个俱乐部

translation.en: And guess who'd kick me out.
translation.zh: ‎猜猜谁会把我赶出去？

translation.en: Every time, you'd sneak back in.
translation.zh: ‎每次你都会再偷溜进来

translation.en: -[in Zulu] He was naughty, wasn't he? -Hey!
translation.zh:
‎-他很淘气 对吧？
‎-哦嘿！

translation.en: [in English] Thank you for having us. After you, my love.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你邀请我们 你先请 我的爱人

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: ‎嗨

translation.en: [in Zulu] Out. Now.
translation.zh: ‎出去 现在！

translation.en: [DJ in Zulu] Party people, make some noise, make some noise!
translation.zh: ‎派对动物 燥起来啊！

translation.en: [in Zulu] No, no, no! Are you crazy?
translation.zh: ‎不！你疯了吗？

translation.en: [in English] I want you to do the right thing. And yes, the baby is yours!
translation.zh:
‎我希望你做出正确的选择
‎而且没错 孩子是你的！

translation.en: [DJ] The founder and the host of Jiva Loxion Dance Competition!
translation.zh:
‎吉瓦洛希昂舞蹈比赛的
‎创始人和主持人！

translation.en: -You can't win, you know my wife! -[DJ Happygal] None other than…
translation.zh: ‎靠近我或我妻子！ ‎你要是敢…

translation.en: I'll file a restraining order against you.
translation.zh: ‎我就对你申请禁制令 知道了吗？

translation.en: -…DJ Jika-Jika. -Don't threaten me!
translation.zh: ‎DJ西卡 ‎少威胁我！

translation.en: [in Zulu] Do you hear me?
translation.zh: ‎听见我说了吗？

translation.en: [DJ Happygal in English] I'm talking about Mr. Platinum Live
translation.zh: ‎说的就是白金人生先生

translation.en: DJ Sika!
translation.zh: ‎DJ西卡！

translation.en: Come on, make some noise! Make some noise!
translation.zh: ‎来吧！来吧！欢呼起来吧！

translation.en: Party people, where you at?
translation.zh: ‎派对动物们 欢呼声在哪里？

translation.en: [in Zulu] It's good to be here.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 在哪里？

translation.en: [in English] That's what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: ‎就是这样

translation.en: Over the next couple of weeks,
translation.zh: ‎在接下来的几周里

translation.en: you will cry, you will sweat,
translation.zh: ‎你会流泪 你会流汗

translation.en: and you will dance for your lives.
translation.zh: ‎还会跳舞…为生命而舞

translation.en: And in the end, only three groups will be named the Jiva Loxion champions!
translation.zh:
‎但最后 只有三个舞团
‎会被称为吉瓦洛希昂比赛的胜利者

translation.en: Now, I will be deciding your fate
translation.zh: ‎现在 我将与俱乐部的创办人

translation.en: alongside the legendary founder of Club eRoyal,
translation.zh: ‎现在 我将与俱乐部的创办人 ‎坦迪D女士！一起决定你们的命运

translation.en: Miss Thandi-D!
translation.zh: ‎坦迪D女士！一起决定你们的命运

translation.en: And of course not forgetting the queen of SA Jiva,
translation.zh: ‎同时别忘了吉瓦女王

translation.en: the bodacious, the ever so beautiful, Ms. Bontle Modisele!
translation.zh: ‎无与伦比的美丽女士…邦特莫迪斯！

translation.en: God, she is insane!
translation.zh: ‎天啊 她绝了！

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: ‎是啊

translation.en: [DJ Sika] Yeah, yeah! As you can see,
translation.zh: ‎对啊 对！ ‎如你所见 DJ西卡总令人眼前一亮

translation.en: DJ Sika always provides you with the best of the best,
translation.zh: ‎如你所见 DJ西卡总令人眼前一亮

translation.en: and there'll be more surprises as the night goes by. But for now,
translation.zh:
‎今晚还将有更多惊喜
‎但此刻 我要介绍

translation.en: I'd like to introduce last year's Jiva Loxion champions.
translation.zh:
‎今晚还将有更多惊喜
‎但此刻 我要介绍 ‎吉瓦洛希昂比赛去年的冠军 德班

translation.en: Durban, please make some noise
translation.zh: ‎吉瓦洛希昂比赛去年的冠军 德班 ‎来 掌声欢迎索韦托猫！

translation.en: for Soweto Cats!
translation.zh: ‎来 掌声欢迎索韦托猫！

translation.en: [Nathi] Hey, hey, hey.
translation.zh: ‎嘿

translation.en: [in Zulu] I love you, okay.
translation.zh: ‎我爱你 你知道的

translation.en: [in English] When I shine, you shine. When I win, you're coming with me to Joburg.
translation.zh:
‎我的荣耀就是你的荣耀 我赢了的话
‎就带你一起去约翰内斯堡

translation.en: [woman] If we call your number, please step forward.
translation.zh: ‎叫到你的号码时 请上前一步

translation.en: Right. Number four.
translation.zh: ‎好了 四号

translation.en: And number eight.
translation.zh: ‎和八号

translation.en: Congratulations, you're going on tour!
translation.zh: ‎恭喜 你们将会参加巡演！

translation.en: Thank you, thank you so much! [laughs excitedly, in Zulu] Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 非常感谢！

translation.en: But he stole my life.
translation.zh: ‎姐妹 他偷了我的人生

translation.en: No! Sister, you're not going to compare yourself to Makhekhe.
translation.zh: ‎不！姐妹 别把自己跟马克赫克比

translation.en: That's supposed to be me on that stage.
translation.zh: ‎应该是我站在那个舞台上的

translation.en: [woman] Number eight, congratulations, you're going on tour!
translation.zh: ‎八号 恭喜 你们将会参加巡演！

translation.en: Thank you, thank you so much!
translation.zh: ‎八号 恭喜 你们将会参加巡演！ ‎谢谢 非常感谢！

translation.en: [Uncle] Ntombi!
translation.zh: ‎恩托比！

translation.en: [in Zulu] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: ‎很抱歉…

translation.en: Your father.
translation.zh: ‎你爸爸…

translation.en: Your mother tried to stop him, but he shot himself.
translation.zh: ‎你母亲试图阻止他 但他开枪自杀了

translation.en: No!
-Ntombi. -No! No! [sobbing] No!
translation.zh:
‎-恩托比
‎-不！不！

translation.en: -Where's Mom? -She's in the hospital.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈在哪里？ ‎她在医院

translation.en: [in Zulu] Hey. I miss you, Vuvu.
translation.zh: ‎我好想你 小维

translation.en: [in English] And I know you miss me too.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 你也很想我

translation.en: You know what I don't miss?
translation.zh: ‎你知道我不怀念什么吗？

translation.en: I don't miss bailing you out of jail.
translation.zh: ‎不怀念保释你出狱

translation.en: -Twice. -Ahh. Come here.
[in Zulu] I don't miss giving you my money.
translation.zh: ‎不怀念给你我的钱

translation.en: [in English] Your fly-by-night businesses, side hustles!
translation.zh: ‎你的夜晚副业！

translation.en: And I definitely don't miss wondering whether you're alive or not.
translation.zh: ‎更不会怀念担心你是否还活着的滋味

translation.en: [in Zulu] You were busy gallivanting with your boys!
translation.zh:
‎-你就忙着和那帮小子们闹事！
‎-不是的！小维

translation.en: -No! No! -Vuvu.
[in English] You're a boy. Not a man.
translation.zh: ‎不 你就是个孩子…不是男人

translation.en: And that's why we're not together.
translation.zh: ‎所以 我们才没有在一起

translation.en: -Right? -Huh.
translation.zh: ‎不是吗？

translation.en: [in Zulu] Move. Move!
translation.zh: ‎走开 走开！

translation.en: [in Zulu] You all right?
translation.zh: ‎你没事吧？

translation.en: Huh?
[in English] Sorry. Do you want to… do you want to dance?
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 你想去跳舞吗？

translation.en: I mean, whatever it is you're feeling right now,
translation.zh: ‎我意思是 无论你心情多糟 都不会…

translation.en: can't be that bad that you can't just dance, just shake it off.
translation.zh: ‎我意思是 无论你心情多糟 都不会… ‎影响你跳舞吧 ‎摇摆起来 舞起来 忘掉那些不愉快

translation.en: Just dance it off, just dance it off, [in Zulu] what do you think?
translation.zh: ‎摇摆起来 舞起来 忘掉那些不愉快 ‎你觉得呢？

translation.en: [in English] Please leave me alone.
translation.zh: ‎拜托别烦我

translation.en: Please, take me home.
translation.zh: ‎快送我回家

translation.en: -Now? -[in Zulu] Now!
translation.zh:
‎-现在？
‎-现在！

translation.en: -[in English] But we just-- -[in Zulu] Vuyiswa, let's go!
translation.zh:
‎-但是 姐妹 我们才…
‎-维依斯瓦 走了！

translation.en: [in English] Fine. No one's fighting you!
translation.zh: ‎没人跟你作对啊！

translation.en: Oh, my God, it's Makhekhe and the Cats!
translation.zh: ‎天呐 那是马克赫克和索韦托猫！
